metadata.name: BRC - Boss Rush Challenge
metadata.description:
[url=https://github.com/SoarCaxton/brc_3591461328]>GitHub<[/url]
Final Boss Fights in a row! All final bosses will appear one after another. Good luck! How to play: Challenges - Custom Challenges - Boss Rush Challenge Note: Do not exit the game outside the Boss room, or the challenge progress will be reset! 终点头目车轮战！ 所有的终点头目轮番上阵，祝你胜利！ 游戏方法： 挑战 - 自定义挑战 - Boss Rush Challenge 注意：不要在Boss房外退出游戏，否则挑战进度会清零！
